abstract: It seemed as if Citigroup was regaining a bit of trust on Wall Street, but as the struggling giant moved toward a deal with Morgan Stanley, all the old demons returned.
snippet: It seemed as if Citigroup was regaining a bit of trust on Wall Street, but as the struggling giant moved toward a deal with Morgan Stanley, all the old demons returned.
lead_paragraph: For a few brief weeks, it seemed as if Vikram S. Pandit, the chief executive of Citigroup, was regaining a bit of trust on Wall Street. But on Monday, as the struggling financial giant moved toward a deal with Morgan Stanley for its Smith Barney brokerage unit, all the old demons returned.

abstract: More capital injections into the banking sector might be needed for a long-term recovery, the Federal Reserve chairman said.
snippet: More capital injections into the banking sector might be needed for a long-term recovery, the Federal Reserve chairman said.
lead_paragraph: LONDON  The chairman of the Federal Reserve, Ben S. Bernanke, warned Tuesday that the highly unpopular job of using taxpayer money to bail out financial institutions in the United States and other countries was far from over.

headline.main: Stimulus Alone Won’t End Crisis, Bernanke Says
headline.print_headline: Stimulus Also Requires Stability, Bernanke Says

byline.original: By Julia Werdigier and Edmund L. Andrews

abstract: Citigroup is moving to dismantle large parts of its troubled financial empire, undoing the landmark merger that created the company a decade ago.
snippet: Citigroup is moving to dismantle large parts of its troubled financial empire, undoing the landmark merger that created the company a decade ago.
lead_paragraph: Staggered by losses despite two federal rescues, Citigroup is accelerating moves to dismantle parts of its troubled financial empire in an effort to placate regulators and its anxious investors.

headline.main: Citigroup Plans to Split Itself Up, Taking Apart the Financial Supermarket
headline.print_headline: Citigroup Plans to Split Itself Up, Taking Apart the Financial Supermarket
